page.title: 06A SURVEY OF CHEQUERBENT
page.content: {TYPE OF DWELLING} Flat 2.5% Bungalow 14% Terraced 9% Detached 35% Semi-detached 39% {AGE OF DWELLING 49% Less than 10 years,9% 10_20 years 20% 20_30 years, 21% 30 tears and over {LENGTH OF RESIDENCY 45% have always lived in this area 71% have relatives in this area {EMPLOYMENT} 45% Work locally,11% are self-employed 37.5% work over 40 hours a week {TRANSPORT} 69% sometimes use public transport 84% own a car,57.5% drive British cars 2.5% use a motorbike. {SHOPPING} 41% shop locally,21% sometimes shop in Westhoughton,17.5% sometimes shop in Bolton,51% shop in both Westhoughton and Bolton.
